item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com A message from our sponsor, Observe, Inc.: Built on a scalable, cost-efficient data lake, Observe delivers AI-powered observability at scale. With its context-aware Knowledge Graph and AI SRE, Observe enables Capital One, Topgolf, and Dialpad to ingest hundreds of terabytes daily and resolve issues faster—at drastically lower cost.
